meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of a fop.
meanings.sent1: He dressed foppishly, wearing a bright pink suit to the party.
meanings.sent2: He walked foppishly down the street, drawing attention with his flamboyant outfit.
meanings.sent3: The man foppishly adjusted his tie, trying to impress the ladies nearby.
meanings.sent4: His gestures were foppishly elegant, like a peacock displaying its feathers.
meanings.sent5: The actor portrayed the character foppishly, capturing the essence of a dandy.

meanings.definition: In a showy or extravagant way.
meanings.sent1: She decorated the room foppishly, with glittering lights and golden curtains.
meanings.sent2: The singer performed foppishly on stage, with elaborate costumes and dramatic gestures.
meanings.sent3: The cake was foppishly decorated with layers of frosting and edible pearls.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky foppishly, painting it with bursts of color.
meanings.sent5: The magician pulled off his tricks foppishly, leaving the audience in awe.
